archimate:Assessment.name: It's probable that Tietoevry during the RFP phase will miscalculate the budget required to operate the contract
archimate:Assessment.documentation: Based on the risk: There's a risk that Tietoevry during the RFP phase miscalculates the budget required to operate the contract Which is due to the customer stating that they don't have any security classified information, but then the conditions change The consequence would be a sudden increase in cost to operate the account
